cards.title: Crypto Bro
cards.body: Here for love. Or funding. Preferably both.

cards.title: Life Coach at 23
cards.body: I help people find their purpose from my parents' basement.

cards.title: Digital Nomad
cards.body: Will ghost you from a different timezone.

cards.title: Plant Parent
cards.body: Talk nicely to me or to my monstera; same result.

cards.title: Gymfluencer
cards.body: Swipe right if you love 4 a.m. alarms and whey protein burps.

cards.title: I Swear I'm 6'0' Guy
cards.body: Actually 5'10 but standing on integrity.

cards.title: BookTok Baddie
cards.body: Reads only enemies-to-lovers. Might apply it to you.

cards.title: Dungeon Master
cards.body: Will absolutely monologue. Will not apologize.

cards.title: Verified Traveler
cards.body: All photos taken at Machu Picchu. No further questions.

cards.title: Pet Parent
cards.body: I'm just here so my corgi can get brand deals.

cards.title: Yoga Instructor
cards.body: I'm flexible, but not about my boundaries.

cards.title: Goth Witch
cards.body: Burns sage… and bridges.

cards.title: Algorithm Addict
cards.body: Optimizing my profile more than my life.

cards.title: Food Photographer
cards.body: Meals must be lukewarm before eating.

cards.title: Prepper
cards.body: Swipe right if you like bunkers and emotional distance.

cards.title: Praise Princess
cards.body: I'm here for the compliments, not the commitment.

cards.title: Star Gazer
cards.body: If this date goes badly, I'm blaming the planets.

cards.title: Sapiosexual
cards.body: I'm attracted to intelligence, especially mine.

cards.title: The Angler
cards.body: Caught this fish. Still looking to catch feelings.

cards.title: Denial Queen
cards.body: Trying to rewrite my 20s by dating someone in theirs.

cards.title: Bimbo
cards.body: Wait… Canada's a country?

cards.title: The Polyamorist
cards.body: Ethically insensitive. Free to be avoidant.

cards.title: Single Parent
cards.body: I'm only free when my kid's asleep.

cards.title: Digital Pen Pal
cards.body: I'm here for long paragraphs and zero plans.

cards.title: Finance Guy
cards.body: Yes, I work in finance. No, I can't explain what I do.

cards.title: Minimalist
cards.body: I own 4 items. One is emotional baggage.

cards.title: Workaholic
cards.body: Available on weekends. Sometimes.

cards.title: Death Metalhead
cards.body: Growls on stage, soft boi at heart.

cards.title: Podcast Host
cards.body: Has a podcast no one asked for.

cards.title: Mistress of Mischief
cards.body: Swipe left without permission and we'll have words.

cards.title: Car Guy
cards.body: My personality is Mazerati.

cards.title: Cosplayer
cards.body: I look different in every photo. Good luck.

cards.title: Gamer
cards.body: I promise I can pause… sometimes.

cards.title: Wine Mom
cards.body: It's always rosé o'clock somewhere.

cards.title: Gravel Goblin
cards.body: Eats dirt roads for breakfast. Needs someone to hold snacks.

cards.title: Entrepreneur
cards.body: Founder of three startups. All in stealth mode.

cards.title: Conspiracy Theorist
cards.body: Birds aren't real but our connection could be.

cards.title: Hippie Anarchist
cards.body: Lives in a van. Smells like... freedom.

cards.title: Romantic
cards.body: Looking for love. With dramatic rain scenes.

cards.title: Geologist
cards.body: My rocks have names. Respect them.

cards.title: Freegan
cards.body: Will eat anything as long as it was free.

cards.title: NFT Artist
cards.body: My art is intangible. My ego isn't.

cards.title: Bluebeard
cards.body: I give great vows. Long-term results may vary.

cards.title: Renfairer
cards.body: I court like it's 1487.

cards.title: DIYer
cards.body: Everything is a project. Including you.

cards.title: Ex-Influencer
cards.body: Fame faded. Trauma stayed.

cards.title: Baker
cards.body: Kneads love.

cards.title: Potter
cards.body: Wants to recreate the Ghost scene.

cards.title: Runner
cards.body: Runs from problems at record pace.

cards.title: Streamer
cards.body: Mind if I stream this? My followers need to meet you in real time.

cards.title: Collector
cards.body: I only date limited editions. Are you numbered?

cards.title: Proudly Extra
cards.body: My personality comes in 64 colors. Try to keep up.
